title: Chaplain Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Saint Joseph Health System (Mishawaka, IN) in Aug 2021
Interview Descriptions: Pre-interview by phone. The In-person interview with the director and staff was warm and respectful. The director walked me to the parking lot. I felt support from the other chaplains and never felt bad vibes from anyone.
Interview Questions: They asked about my call to chaplaincy.

title: Certified Nursing Assistant CNA Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Saint Joseph Health System (Bloomington, IL) in Nov 2020
Interview Descriptions: During my job interview , I was very confident in my self as well as the process to becoming an employee for saint joseph hospital. It was awsome to have been recognized and hired to a wonderful team.
Interview Questions: How would I handle certain situatiuons.

title: Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Saint Joseph Health System (Santa Rosa, CA) in Aug 2020
Interview Descriptions: Began with an on-demand interview with 4 attempts to answer, 3 minutes per question with 6 questions total. The  hiring processed moved quickly as i was contacted for a second interview 3 days later as well as a reference check
Interview Questions: Why did you become an RN?

title: Staff RN Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Saint Joseph Health System
Interview Descriptions: Tough. Very confusing- went from HR over to the hospital for a second interview after the first. Then it was an hour long interview on the floor- people kept walking in and out of the directors office in the middle of the interview. Pretty unprofessional.

title: Nuclear Medicine Technologist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Saint Joseph Health System in Apr 2018
Interview Descriptions: The process was fairly straight forward. Called for an interview, interview took about an hour. Met with department manager who asked standard interview questions - nothing too tricky. Met with lead tech of the department who was able to get a feel for who I was and ask whatever questions they wanted.
Interview Questions: Discuss a time that you had to deal with a difficult patient?

title: Supervisor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Saint Joseph Health System (Mishawaka, IN) in Apr 2018
Interview Descriptions: They usually start you off on line.  They want you to apply on line.  Once that’s done, someone in HR reviews your qualifications.  If you get past that, then you go to local manager and there they might do a team interview or one-on-one.
Interview Questions:
Why did you apply for this position?
Tell me /us about yourself.
Tell us about a situation where you .......

title: Nurse Extern Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Saint Joseph Health System (Mishawaka, IN) in Mar 2018
Interview Descriptions: There is an online application, and if your application fits all requirements, they will ask to do an in person interview at Saint Joseph's Regional Medical Center in front of an interview panel.
Interview Questions: When is a time you went above and beyond for a patient?

title: Tech Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Saint Joseph Health System in Jun 2017
Interview Descriptions: The interview questions are the basic interview questions and your qualifications.  If you do a simple google search for sample questions, those are the ones they will be asking.
Interview Questions: Give me an example of how you handled a stressful situation.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Saint Joseph Health System (Mishawaka, IN)
Interview Descriptions:
Started with phone interview x2
Then I was brought in to talk with potential leaders
It was a low pressure interview as they are having problems finding nurses in the community
I met with various porential supervisors and managers
They had a pretty thorough process - similar to most.
Drug screening and phtysical was necessary
Interview Questions:
1. Why here?
2. Tell us strengths
3. Tell us weaknesses
4. Describe yourself
5. Are you easy to get along with?

title: Staff RN Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Saint Joseph Health System (South Bend, IN) in Apr 2016
Interview Descriptions: I interviewed during my internship of my senior year of nursing school.  I spent over 136 hours in the department and spoke with the manager and other staff RN's on numerous occasions. I had one multiperson interview with the manager and one single interview with the hiring manager of the department.
Interview Questions:
Was given different scenarios regarding patients and how would I handle them?
Describe myself.
How would others describe me?

title: Staff RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at Saint Joseph Health System (Norville, MO) in Jul 2015
Interview Descriptions:
I came in 3 hs earlier, they anted to interview me.
I reminded them that my interview was scheduled at 5pm
I would like to allow you to prepare for the interview.
At the time of interview, They came up with written questions for the interview.
Interview Questions:
what was your experience as a manager?
Give an example why did you not like you job?
What did you do when employees are in conflicts?

title: Pharmacy Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Saint Joseph Health System (Mishawaka, IN) in Oct 2013
Interview Descriptions: Quick - 1 interview with hiring supervisor.  It was quick to get the interview but took 3 weeks to make job offer.  Not unusually  bad, I suppose.  I didn't get any updates - just a call with the job offer.  It was quicker than I expected.
Interview Questions:
Typical:  Why here?  Tell us strengths, weaknesses.  What do you bring to the table.
They were standard questions by the hiring supervisor.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Saint Joseph Health System (Mishawaka, IN) in May 2012
Interview Descriptions:
First phone, then one-on-one. They started with someone from HR.  Then I was invited onto the campus.  There I interviewed with small teams - mostly HR people but some nurses.  They showed me around the building - nice, new facility.  I was impressed by the building - but a building does not make a good hospital.  You can have an average, old facility but it can be a place of great healthcare.
I can tell you now, that place is not great.
They made me an offer and stated that it's a take it or leave it ..... so I took it.
Interview Questions:
1. Why do you want to work here?
2. Tell us your strengths
3. Your weaknesses
4. Tell us about a time when you had a run in with a patient?
5. Why should we hire you?

title: Administrative Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2+ months. I interviewed at Saint Joseph Health System (Mishawaka, IN) in May 2009
